synopsis: Tsukasa runs for Student Council and elects Junichi as her vice president. However, things hit a snag when someone else chooses Junichi as a vice presidential candidate.
Junichi almost falls prey to a vicious trick. Later, Tsukasa delivers an inspiring speech that might win the election!
Junichi suffers from fatigue caused by a poor diet. To his surprise, Rihoko cooks for him.
Makabe resolves to leave Rihoko alone. Junichi feels awkward around Rihoko now that he realizes she loves him.
Junichi and Ai reminisce about their year of dating during a trip to the beach.
During the Founder's Festival, Miya and Sae play the lead roles in Romeo and Juliet while Ai works at the Oden Stand for the Girl's Swim Team.
We catch a glimpse of part of the summer that Kaoru spent with Junichi and how the details of their friendship was called into question by onlookers.
Junichi and Kaoru miss the bus and are subsequently picked up by a truck whose driver drops them at a hot spring. They receive some relationship advice.
Junichi and Sae have been dating for almost a year, and Sae's self-confidence has improved greatly. As a result, her quality of life has improved.
Tsukasa helps Sae with her duties for the Founder's Festival; meanwhile Junichi is feeling blue about not spending a lot of time with Sae.
Haruka catches Junichi by surprise when she brings up a dreaded subject: meeting the parents!
Junichi receives a shock when Haruka announces she will soon be leaving for England.
Miya mistakenly brings bath salts to Junichi which are "Abstinence Salts."
